## OptionalMentionExtensionParams.replacementType property

The type of replacement to use. By default the command will only replace text up the the cursor position.

To force replacement of the whole match regardless of where in the match the cursor is placed set this to `full`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
replacementType?: SuggestReplacementType;
```
